name: cloudsim-grant
description: A small grant/revoke module for cloudsim

scripts.coveralls: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint . && export NODE_ENV=test; istanbul cover _mocha -- -u exports -R spec && istanbul-coveralls
scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint . && export NODE_ENV=test; istanbul cover --print both _mocha -- -u exports -R spec

author: hugo@osrfoundation.org
